data.message: No sir theres no such thing theres only one God and thats my heavenly father i used to be a huge eminem fan but after i heard and seen i was shocked Eminem its about time for you to repent and give your life to christ

replies.message: You don't really know if theres is a god..
I hope you're kidding. That's gayest shit I've ever read.
That is really really stupid. Like listening to your imaginary friend stupid.
dude i know that there is only one god (Allah).....but he is sayin' a Rap God....not a god
You're absolutely right! I used to love Eminem! He's so evil, I can't stand his songs anymore, I had hope for him listening to his last album, but now? There's no turning back for him anymore.....
You guys shuld not be decived, have'nt you heard of jay z song that he rap murder God. So nobody hate eminem, if you truely luv him as you claim pray that God have mercy on him.

And that means you guys believe there in the devil but im not going to get into all that cause your minds are based off something not eminem but the whole demonic category all i can do is pray for you all
Y'all stop coming at the man and respect his views and religion is not for the deluded its for those who know but can't prove that there's more to life then just living
seems be you lost!! the dude talking bout "RAP" do you need it to be highlighted before you know he talking bout music and not God above?? you need a life like you the holy one!!

Man i jus Kid that try to.know i dont care what ppl think it can be rap , athletics anything God is very jealous God lovest thou more than these i kid you.not Eminem was my fav rapper i jus some ish.and it literally scared the ish out me and i didnt want to.believe it until the holy spirit.told me to read the bible and it showed that those who has idols and worship.them shall.burn in hell i kid you not
He said he's a rap God not God. As in... he's the best..

Kt, Eminem is comparing himself to other rappers, he is saying to other rappers, when it comes to rap he's god, because of his range of styles and skills, he's not putting down the heavenly father in any way.
